channel.title: lombok on Inductive Bias
channel.description: Recent content in lombok on Inductive Bias

item.title: Devoxx – Day three
item.description: Devoxx – Day three # The panel discussion on the future of Java was driven by visitor submitted and voted questions on the current state and future of Java. The general take-aways for me included the clear statement that the TCK will never be made available to the ASF. The promise of Oracle to continue supporting the Java community and remaining active in the JCP. There was some discussion on whether coming Java versions should be backwards-incompatible.
